tool.name: SC3 Prepare
tool.command:
sc3-sc3-prepare.R -i '${scater_log}' -o '${sc3_prepared}' -t 1
#if $gene_filter.use: -f TRUE -p '${gene_filter.pct_dropout_min}' -q '${gene_filter.pct_dropout_max}' #end if #if $d_region_min: -d '${d_region_min}' #end if #if $d_region_max: -d '${d_region_max}' #end if #if $svm_num_cells: -n '${svm_num_cells}' #end if #if $svm_train_inds: -r '${svm_train_inds}' #end if #if $svm_max: -m '${svm_max}' #end if #if $seed: -s '${seed}' #end if #if $kmeans_nstart: -k '${kmeans_nstart}' #end if #if $kmeans_iter_max: -a '${kmeans_iter_max}' #end if

param.name: scater_log
param.label: Serialised SingleCellExperiment object normalised by scater

param.name: use
param.label: Perform gene filtering?
param.help: A boolean variable which defines whether to perform gene filtering before SC3 clustering.

param.name: pct_dropout_min
param.label: Minimum percent of dropouts
param.help: An integer value. Genes with percent of dropouts smaller than this value are filtered out before clustering.

param.name: pct_dropout_max
param.label: Maximum percent of dropouts
param.help: An integer value. Genes with percent of dropouts larger than this value are filtered out before clustering.

param.name: d_region_min
param.label: Minimum number of eigenvectors used for kmeans clustering as a fraction of the total number of cells

param.name: d_region_max
param.label: Maximum number of eigenvectors used for kmeans clustering as a fraction of the total number of cells

param.name: svm_num_cells
param.label: Number of randomly selected training cells to be used for SVM prediction.

param.name: svm_train_inds
param.label: Text file with one integer per line defining indices of training cells that should be used for SVM training

param.name: svm_max
param.label: The number of cells below which SVM are not run

param.name: seed
param.label: Seed of the random number generator
param.help: SC3 is a stochastic method, so setting the rand_seed to a fixed values can be used for reproducibility purposes.

param.name: kmeans_nstart
param.label: Number of random starts for kmeans
param.help: When unspecified, default to 1000 for up to 2000 cells and 50 for more than 2000 cells.

param.name: kmeans_iter_max
param.label: Maximum number of iterations for kmeans
